author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Add tests for *-service cmdlets.

Related code coverage report: https://codecov.io/gh/PowerShell/PowerShell/src/9e41c647a9407e05d86f4971a6bd25719a7130d0/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Management/commands/management/Service.cs

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
Doing this in parts to keep the code reviews simpler:

- [x] Get tests
- [x] Set-New tests
- [x] Start-Stop-Suspend-Resume-Restart tests

title: Add test for *-Service cmdlets
